expected.meta_description: MONTGOMERY, Ala. -- Alabama's strict new immigration law may be backfiring. Intended to force illegal workers out of jobs, it is also driving away many construction workers, roofers and field hands in the country legally who do backbreaking jobs that Americans generally won't.
expected.meta_keywords: alabama, workers, leave, state, as, immigration, law, takes, effect, business
expected.cleaned_text: MONTGOMERY, Ala. -- Alabama's strict new immigration law may be backfiring.
